taxonomicnotes: Described as Cobitis thermalis by Valenciennes 1846 from the hot waters of Cania, Sri Lanka.
rationale: Lepidocephalus thermalis is assessed as Least Concern in view of its wide distribution, there are no major threats and because the population is unlikely to be declining.
evaluator: Dahanukar, N., Raghavan, R., Ali, A., Molur, S. & Cox, N.A.
